Text: O̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta ku Sairo̩s jʼonu Pe̩rsia ma mʼo̩laʼka biru Danie̩l ku ma rʼodu ko̩ Be̩lte̩shaza eju. O̩la le̩ la chʼochochi. O̩la ogu inaina i la che. Tak i fʼoji o̩la le̩ ma, oñ i fʼoji ane̩ kʼi go le̩ ma.
Iko le̩, omi Danie̩l, nʼeku ade̩ o̩jo̩ mebie ebie me̩ta.
U jʼuje̩wñ e̩rinyo̩ du n, e̩la kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma la kadʼalu-mi n; u la dʼekpo kulu o̩la re n, gbogbo wa tak o̩jo̩ mebie ebie me̩ta ki jo̩ kpa.
E̩gba kʼochu ejodudu nʼolu ogu nyoke me̩le̩, abu kʼu dago eti aji lile le̩, owñ che He̩de̩ke̩l,
u chʼeju-mi nyʼate̩ ago, e̩ la go, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka fʼukpo line̩n efufu bʼo̩la ma dago, o̩jamalia Ufaz lʼago-wñ de;

año̩la-wñ la dab okuta be̩re̩l; oñ eju-wñ dab o̩mamanya; e̩yo̩ eju-wñ la dab e̩mu ki adʼo̩go̩; o̩wo̩-wñ kpai e̩re̩-wñ abʼeju je̩ ña ña ña dab ebijekpa ku ma gwe̩; omuko̩la-wñ la dab ekuku o̩wo̩ amone̩.
Omi, Danie̩l, kate fʼane̩ ego le̩ li, todu aboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼugbo mi li ane̩ ego le̩ n; o̩la-ma muda agagogodo nana, oñ ma ra le ku ma kʼo̩la-ma maja.
Abe̩le̩ i bo̩ omi kate, oñ u fʼane̩ ego lile-i li; ukpahiu du la bo̩ ef umi n; alifia-mi murida e̩che̩; ukpahiu du la bo̩ ef umi n.
U muda agbʼomuko̩la-wñ; oñ e̩gba kʼu fʼomuko̩la-wñ gbo ugoju mʼumi da, oñ u fʼeju tunyʼane̩, eju-mi la bʼane̩ ma.
Me̩ la go, o̩wo̩ʼka kadʼomi, i mi umi ejo, i la mʼo̩wo̩-mi kpai okuku-mi ko kad ane̩.

Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, O Danie̩l, uwe̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi afe̩do̩ tabale-i, e̩ gbo̩ o̩la kʼu naka ñw e̩-i, kʼe̩ la kwane̩ dago kpakpa, todu uwe̩ oñ ma kpe̩ mi ru-i. Abu kʼi do̩mo̩ akʼo̩la-i ñwu mi, u kwane̩ dago, o̩la-mi naga.

Tak i ka ñwu ml kakini, Danie̩l, e̩ ki railo n, todu akwʼo̩jo̩ ejodudu kʼe̩ fu ñwa ef e̩do̩-we̩ ka kʼuwe̩ ama oji-wñ, kʼe̩ lañʼahi o̩la-we̩ wane̩ eju O̩jo̩-we̩, ma gbo̩ uko̩la-we̩, ewa-mi-i chʼutodu uko̩la-we̩ le̩.
Agboji ojane̩ Pe̩rsia gbʼo̩na nyʼumi o̩jo̩ ogu nyokeʼka; e̩ la go, Maike̩l, kʼi dʼef amagboji ki tʼo̩gba, lewa kʼi te̩ko mi; oñ ma ño̩ nʼeku mi ugbo amonu Pe̩rsia.
Fa-i, u la lewa kʼu je̩ ñw e̩ mʼoji e̩wñ ki ake̩re̩bʼamone̩-we̩ e̩gba iko otitala; todu ane̩ ego le̩ chʼutodu iko o̩jo̩ ki dʼubi.
Tak e̩gba kʼi nʼo̩la abe̩le̩ ko̩la ñwu mi kpa, u mʼeju-mi korʼane̩, oli la kpo̩ tʼumi alu.

E̩ la go, e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi biu amo̩ma amone̩ do̩wo̩kadʼuko-mi; tak u mʼalu-mi chi, u chane̩ eko̩la, oñ u ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki dago o̩gba-mi kakini, O odu-mi, Lugbo ane̩ ego le̩ e̩do̩dudu-mi mudabi wa abʼumi ma, ukpahiu-mi la bo̩ n.
Todu abile̩ kʼadu odu-mi-i aneke ko̩la ñw odu-mi-i? Todu i bo̩ tʼe-mi, e̩re̩re̩le̩ ukpahiu ño̩ bo̩ ef umi n, iñmi du la bo̩ ef umi n.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi dab one̩ ño̩ do̩wo̩kadʼomi, i la dʼukpahiu ñwu mi.

Oñ i kakini, O one̩ kʼi afe̩do̩ tabale le̩, e̩ ki railo n; ure̩do̩ ki chʼe-we̩, fʼukpahiu ne̩; ochochi, fʼukpahiu ne̩. Tak e̩gba kʼi ko̩la ñwu mi, u fʼukpahiu ne̩ nyʼo̩-gba, oñ u kakini, Odu-mi ki ko̩la ke; todu e̩ mʼukpahiu du ñwu mi me̩.
Tak i kakini, E̩ chema e̩wñ ki chi kʼomi wʼugbo we̩? Fa-i tak u nadabi akʼogu bʼagboji Pe̩rsia le̩; oñ e̩gba kʼu ledufu agboji Griki awa.
Omi muda aka e̩wñ ku ma kʼo̩rubutu-wñ ef O̩takada Ochochi le̩ ñw e̩. I la nʼe̩ne̩ du ki adʼukpahiu ñw o̩la-wñ kʼi ako bʼe̩wñ-i manyʼumi n, chai Maike̩l, agboji-we̩ le̩.
